Pravin Kandala

My name is Pravin Kandala, I'm a budding software engineer,a desire to learn and the ability to work towards my goals with single minded dedication are the highlights of my candidature

I graduated from Jawaharlal Nehru Technological Institute, Hyderabad,India with Distinction in Computer Science Engineering in 2014

My interest in Cloud Computing encouraged me to explore more on "Interfacing the cloud", a concept of storing data on Amazon S3 and Google App Engine with full and incremental backup techniques.

The incremental backup is done using an open source algorithm "diftUtils" by Dmitry Naumenko. This is where I started writing the article for International journal [1],apart from this I have also developed apps on various other platforms.

I always had the urge to contribute to the open-source family. My contributions are hosted primarily ongithub.com/pravinkandala

I spend my work days learning new things or coding stuff, and spare time drawing caricatures or playing video games. I live in Hyderabad,India
